AI_in_Biology.title: ## Key Concepts of AI in Biology
AI_in_Biology.description:
**AI in Biology**

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming biological research by enabling advanced data analysis, pattern recognition, and predictive modeling. In fields like genomics, proteomics, and drug discovery, AI enhances our ability to process vast datasets and extract meaningful insights.

Key applications include:
- **Medical Diagnostics:** AI-powered tools help detect diseases like cancer through medical imaging and genomic analysis.
- **Drug Discovery:** Machine Learning models accelerate drug screening and development.
- **Personalized Medicine:** AI-driven models analyze genetic profiles to recommend personalized treatment plans.
- **Agricultural Biotechnology:** AI optimizes crop yield, monitors plant health, and predicts pest infestations.

This section explores these advancements and their impact on life sciences.
